metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000548 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: Umlet version < 14.3 contains a XML External Entity (XXE) vulnerability in File parsing that can result in disclosure of confidential data, denial of service, server side request forgery. This attack appear to be exploitable via Specially crafted UXF file. This vulnerability appears to have been fixed in 14.3.

criterions.comment: umlet package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
